Name: Furry Immersion
About the game: General Furry Immersion is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely FURRY Girls Incredible Atmosphere , Great Music , lots of levels with furry girls art in HD quality. The game is great for relaxing after a hard day. Features Several difficulty levels. Relaxing gameplay 7 HD quality art with beautiful girls Pleasant atmosphere. Game Modes: EASY - 4x4 MEDIUM - 4x6 ADVANCED - 6x10 HARD - 8x14 EPIC - 10x16
